lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
name: luna_lucent_beam

desc: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.
lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
name: luna_moon_glaive

desc: Grants bonus damage to nearby allied heroes, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
name: luna_lunar_blessing

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam. A single target can only be hit a maximum number of times. Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.
Will not hit invisible units.
attrib:
BEAMS: 5/8/11
MAX BEAMS PER UNIT: 5
BEAM INTERVAL: 0.6/0.6/0.6
RADIUS: 675/675/675
DURATION: 2.4/4.2/6
SCEPTER BEAMS: 6/10/14
SCEPTER MAX BEAMS: 6/10/14
SCEPTER DURATION: 3/5.4/7.8
SCEPTER CAST RANGE: 2500
cmb:
150/200/250
160/150/140
lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
name: luna_eclipse
